compliant.section: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of the password and account and are fully responsible for all activities that occur under your password or account.
compliant.legal provisions: This aligns with the principle of accountability, requiring data controllers to implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure and be able to demonstrate compliance with GDPR principles.

compliant.section: You agree to (a) immediately notify Faraday of any unauthorized use of your password or account or any other breach of security
compliant.legal provisions: This refers to the obligation of data breach notification to the supervisory authority and potentially to data subjects without undue delay after becoming aware of a personal data breach.

non_compliant.section: Faraday reserves the right to such approval without offering any reason to you.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness, fairness, and transparency: Data processing must be lawful, fair, and transparent to the data subject. Withholding the reason for refusal might infringe on the transparency principle.
non_compliant.amend: Faraday will provide a clear and concise reason for any account application refusal, respecting the individual's rights under GDPR.

non_compliant.section: You agree to (b) ensure that you exit from your account at the end of each session.
non_compliant.legal provisions: While this is good security practice, it doesn't directly relate to GDPR provisions. GDPR focuses on how organizations handle and protect personal data, not on individual user behavior.
non_compliant.amend: No amendment needed from a GDPR perspective. This can remain as a recommended security practice.
